text: Bastard King of Icehorn Peak
The King of Icehorn Peak sets forth on his everlasting quest to ascend as Nurgle's Gardener.
The secret of a good Garden is not the flowers, it's the soil.
Fertile Garden
Blight Marauders strike fear in the hearts of foes with their rotten joyours grins.
Marauders of Blight
His stain may only be spread in beautiful untainted rot and blight.
Spreading the Stain
Orghottis is one of the true champions of Nurgle that may call upon the rotfather to rain down the garden's delight.
Rotting Oasis
The flesh as weak as it is serves as the ultimate vessel of all kindred spirits.
Weak is the Flesh
The gardener knows may tricks of rot and pus and blight and stench.
Secrets of the Gardener
The pestilent tide marches North in search of their master's ambition.
Tide of Pestilence
Decay is te pinnacle of growth, as all things wither all things are born.
Horrendous Growth

Orghotts is one of three legendary Maggoth Riders and solemnly responsible for the randsacking of large parts of Kislev. He has completely devoted himself to a frantic quest to ascend in to daemonhood. Those worthy to carry the banner of his Tide are left with the same fate of obsession.
Banner of Pestilence

The Rotaxes are a pair of magical Daemon Weapons taken from the Garden of Nurgle. Infected with the blight of that daemonic domain of the Realm of Chaos, all that these axes touch are infected with that plane's corruption. Only a true champion of Nurgle is bestowed the blessing of the rotfather to wield these magnificent tokens of blight, withering and decay.
The Rotaxes
Rotting Oasis
Orghottis is one of the true champions of Nurgle that may call upon the rotfather to rain down the garden's delight.
The Bastard King of Icehorn Peak vows to ascend in to daemonhood and claim his place within Nurgle's garden.
The Rotaxes
It is said the Rotaxes stem from the gardenhouse deep within Nurgle's realm and all they touch decays and withers.
Ability: "The Rotaxes''
Orghott's Riders
The Legendary Maggoth Riders communicate with their Pox Maggoths through the mould that connects rider and beast.
Ability: "Orghott's Riders'' for Pox Riders
Aspirant Gardener: Orghotts seeks the Rotfathers favour by cleansing the unfaithful from his gardens
